snippet: Private employers added 119,000 jobs during the month, well short of expectations for 177,000, according to a report from the payroll processor ADP.
abstract: Stocks are mostly lower as private employers added 119,000 jobs during April, well short of expectations for 177,000.
lead_paragraph: Private employers added 119,000 jobs during the month, well short of expectations for 177,000, according to a report from the payroll processor ADP.

headline.seo: April Job Numbers Fell Short of Expectations
headline.main: April Job Numbers Help Suppress Markets
headline.print_headline: April Job Numbers Help Suppress Markets
